explains: n. 愉快，美妙；甜，芬芳；亲爱的人

sentences.en: Florida oranges have a natural sweetness.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达柑桔有一种天然的甜味。

sentences.en: I hope my mom belongs only to me, so I can enjoy the sweetness of love.
sentences.cn: 我希望我的妈妈只属于我一个人，这样我就可以享受到爱的甜蜜。

sentences.en: The flavor of a croissant should be intensely buttery with a natural dairy sweetness.
sentences.cn: 牛角面包的味道应该是浓郁的黄油味，并带有天然奶制品的甜味。
